Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. This item holds immense significance to me, but I am confident it will also bring great value to your collection or business. Given its rarity and quality, I believe we can agree on a fair exchange. My initial offer for this product is $2000000. I look forward to discussing the details further and understanding what would be a mutually beneficial arrangement for both parties. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $2,000,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $2,000,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
